featured.title: Summer Tournament Series Announced
featured.excerpt: Get ready for the biggest Fairway Solitaire event of the year! The Summer Tournament Series will feature weekly challenges, exclusive rewards, and a grand prize for the overall champion. Players from around the world will compete for the coveted Golden Club trophy and exclusive in-game items.
